  • Method Details

    • lambdaInit

      @SafeVarargs public static <T> T lambdaInit(@NotNull T object, @NotNull @NotNull Consumer<T>... initActions)
      This method is designed to shorten an object initialization to one statement. For example: 
       final Window window = new Window();
 window.maximize();
 window.setTitle("Game");
      becomes:
       final Window window = Utils.lambdaInit(new Window(), Window::maximize, w -> w.setTitle("Game"));
      Type Parameters:
      T - the object class
      Parameters:
      object - the object to initialize
      initActions - actions to be performed on the specified object
      Returns:
      the specified object after initialization

    • cast

      @Nullable public static <T> T cast(@NotNull @NotNull Object object, @NotNull @NotNull Class<T> type)
      Performs a C++ dynamic_cast-style cast of an object to the class or interface represented by the specified Class object.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the target class
      Parameters:
      object - the object to be cast
      type - the target class object
      Returns:
      the object after casting, or null if the object is null or cannot be cast to the specified class

    • toFloatRect

      @NotNull public static @NotNull org.jsfml.graphics.FloatRect toFloatRect(@NotNull @NotNull org.jsfml.graphics.IntRect rect)
      Converts an IntRect to a FloatRect
      Parameters:
      rect - an IntRect object
      Returns:
      a FloatRect object with the same values as the parameter

    • toIntRect

      @NotNull public static @NotNull org.jsfml.graphics.IntRect toIntRect(@NotNull @NotNull org.jsfml.graphics.FloatRect rect)
      Converts a FloatRect to an IntRect, rounding the values down to the nearest integer
      Parameters:
      rect - a FloatRect object
      Returns:
      an IntRect object with the same values as the parameter, rounded down
